description: Listed building consent in connection with proposed amendments to planning permission (under construction) reference P081070 and listed building consent P081071. The material amendments are:1] Provision of additional studios, increasing number of rooms from 50 to 53; 2] Retention and extension of existing external fire escape; 3] Internal and external alterations; and 4] Removal of staircase to upper floor. Also minor material amendment (planning) application P112889 submitted. This application may affect the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved drawings and information:

DESIGN & ACCESS STATEMENT, SCHEDULE B MATERIALS, MARKETING PACK WMSJW/BS/A9660/401, HISTORIC BUILDING ASSESSMENT, PRELIMINARY STRUCTURAL ENGINEERS REPORT, ENERGY STRATEGY, F0001, F0100, F0101, F0102, F0103, F0201, FO202, FO203, FO300, D0100P3, D0101P3, D0102P3, D0103P2, D0104P2, D0201P2, D0202P2, D0203P2, D0204P2, D0301P2, D0302P2, D0303P2, D0304P2, D0400P2, ENERGY STRATEGY (LBI REG 10701)  Planning statement, Economic Statement, Lighting Assessment, Noise Assessment, EMF, Transport Statement, Highways Response letter 30209/D3, 007/AC, 008/AC, 009/AC. [LBI REG 10702] letter from KM Heritage [LBI REG 10703] Schedule D retained/removed items (LBI REG 10704), as amended by SK 01 rev b, 01.1 rev b, 02 rev b, 02.1 rev b, 03 rev b, 03.1 rev b, 04 rev b, 04.1 rev b, SK 05 rev a (south elevation), SK 06 rev a (north elevation), SK 07 rev a (front elevation), SK 08 rev a (rear elevation), SK 09 rev a, SK02.2 rev b and SK03.2 rev b.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
